Reviewing after one month use of this pillow... After testing so many brands and memory foam pillows, I finally got the exact one that I needed. I order small size because I need small height pillow. I’m suffering from cervical spondylosis and post-operative surgical patient, sleeping is very difficult for me. Tried so many pillows and with our pillow to get a better sleep. Finally I tried Rise and shine pillow and it really helped me. This pillow is very soft and comfortable with air holes. This pillows offers a beautiful carry bag, that will help to travel with this easily. Other thing is that, rise and shine offers small, medium and large type pillows. You can choose the size you want. You can definitely try this pillow 👍🏻
